fields.caption:
First ever official #mortytuesday

I drank more tea then I would normally to celebrate.

I also played this guitar for a little while.

Shipping this to @dannygoldfarb in New York in the following days.

Can you think of anything better to cheer you up during the corona crisis then recieving one of these in the mail?

#moarmorty

This one I kinda wanted to keep for myself.

6 way switch from @nsfxfreeway giving you all the pickup combinations you would ever want (and possibly a few extra)

Awkward demonstration of a perfect neck joint.

This perfect fit is the key to my clean neck joints. If they didn't fit so well I wouldn't be able to have such little material around the joint, and I would need to do something basic, like use screws or something üòè

This perfect fit also makes for a more resonant guitar, that sustains for days.

@eivormusic doing what she does best, back when it was allowed to do it in public, with her Wayfair.

I miss the good old days!

Looking through some old builds of mine, and I really didn't spend enough time with this one. The soldiering iron was still hot when @alandublon landed in Copenhagen to collect it.

I think I only have about 4 photos of the build üòï

Can someone else order an Ash Wayfair built to the same specs so I can maybe have a day or so with it before it gets collected or shipped? Please?

#moarwayfair
#moarguitars
